sound.description: The ID of the sound event to play.
sound.markdownDescription: The ID of the sound event to play.

category.description: If specified, this specifies the category and options the sound event falls under. Otherwise, uses the category specified in the entity that invoked this action. Accepts `"master"`, `"music"`, `"record"`, `"weather"`, `"block"`, `"hostile"`, `"neutral"`, `"player"`, `"ambient"` or `"voice"`.
category.markdownDescription: If specified, this specifies the category and options the sound event falls under. Otherwise, uses the category specified in the entity that invoked this action. Accepts `"master"`, `"music"`, `"record"`, `"weather"`, `"block"`, `"hostile"`, `"neutral"`, `"player"`, `"ambient"` or `"voice"`.

volume.description: The volume of the sound event.
volume.markdownDescription: The volume of the sound event.

pitch.description: The pitch of the sound event.
pitch.markdownDescription: The pitch of the sound event.

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/play_sound)

Plays a sound event at the entity's position.

Type ID: `origins:play_sound`


!!! note

    The value of the `volume` field is used to multiply the base distance of the sound event, which is 16 blocks (`1.0`).
type.markdownDescription:
[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/play_sound)

Plays a sound event at the entity's position.

Type ID: `origins:play_sound`


!!! note

    The value of the `volume` field is used to multiply the base distance of the sound event, which is 16 blocks (`1.0`).
